title: Cant load league of legends on mac!
body: I cant load league of legends on mac! I really need help

replies.body:
Well I want to actually be helpful and not say get rid of your mac;

Download Windows with bootcamp.

Hey there.

Try also posting [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL) 

Also try submitting a support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Just so you get more visibility on the boards and, hopefully, the help you need :)
Step 1 throw Mac out nearest window
The issue is you're using a Mac. Get a real PC.
